DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a combination of an antibiotic plus a corticosteroid is safe and effective in treating middle ear infections in children with ear tubes.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of DF289 Plus DF277 Otic Solution in the Treatment of Middle Ear Infections in Pediatric Patients
DOC.criteria: 6 months to 12 years ear tube in the ear which will be treated otorrhea for 3 weeks or less moderate or severe otorrhea other ear diseases
